name: Sisyphos (Bad_Dad)
description:
Sisyphos the Game Boy Game

Roll the rock to the top, it will roll back down. Keep trying... forever!

Use direction keys on your keypad, or D-pad on the Game boy, to direct Sisyphus. Press Z on a keypad or A button on the Game Boy to push the rock.

Sisyphus or Sisyphos was forced, every day, to roll an immense boulder up a mountain, only for it to roll back down every time. This was his punishment from Zeus for cheating death.

Inspired by this classical myth, tasks that are both laborious and futile are therefore described as Sisyphean.
